key.name: portal-address
key.description: The address of the GlobalProtect VPN portal to connect to

key.name: poll-interval
key.description: How often to check VPN connection status (in seconds)

key.name: username
key.description: Optional username for VPN connection. If empty, GlobalProtect will prompt for username.

key.name: ssl-only
key.description: Enable SSL only mode for VPN connection

key.name: log-level
key.description: GlobalProtect log level (error, warning, info, debug)
